scripts.setup:client: cd client && npm install && node --loader ts-node/esm ../copy-env.mts ./
scripts.setup:server: cd server && npm install && node --loader ts-node/esm ../copy-env.mts ./
scripts.setup: npm install && npm run setup:client && npm run setup:server
scripts.dev: npx concurrently "cd server && npm run develop" "npx wait-on http://localhost:1337 && cd client && npm run dev"
scripts.repo:upstream: git fetch upstream && git merge upstream/main
